name: blockchain_oracle
description: A Solana blockchain intelligence toolset for Hermes Agent. Query wallets, inspect transactions, research tokens, browse NFT portfolios, detect whale movements, and monitor network health â€” all through natural language via MCP.
author: gizdusum

tools.name: solana_wallet_info
tools.description: Query a Solana wallet address to get its SOL balance, SPL token holdings (top 20), account type, and owner program. Validates base58 addresses.

tools.name: solana_transaction
tools.description: Look up a Solana transaction by its signature. Returns parsed instructions, SOL and token balance changes, fees, status, slot, and block time. Great for investigating specific on-chain activity.

tools.name: solana_token_info
tools.description: Get information about a Solana SPL token by its mint address. Returns total supply, decimals, mint/freeze authorities, and the top 10 largest holders. Useful for researching tokens and their distribution.

tools.name: solana_recent_activity
tools.description: Get recent transaction history for a Solana wallet. Returns the latest transactions (up to 25) with signatures, timestamps, success status, and memos.

limit.description: Number of recent transactions to fetch (max 25, default 10)

tools.name: solana_nft_portfolio
tools.description: List NFTs owned by a Solana wallet. Identifies NFTs by finding tokens with amount=1 and decimals=0. Returns up to 50 NFT mint addresses.

tools.name: whale_detector
tools.description: Scan recent Solana blocks for large SOL transfers (whale movements). Detects transfers above a configurable threshold. Returns deduplicated whale transactions sorted by size.

min_sol.description: Minimum SOL amount to flag as whale activity (default: 1000)

tools.name: solana_network_stats
tools.description: Get current Solana network health and statistics. Returns current slot, epoch progress, average TPS, total/circulating supply, node version, and health status.
